name: Python

patterns.comment: keywords that delimit flow blocks or alter flow from within a block
patterns.name: keyword.control.flow.python

patterns.comment: keyword operators that evaluate to True or False

patterns.comment: keywords that haven't fit into other groups (yet).
a decorator may be a function call which returns a decorator.
patterns.name: meta.function.decorator.python

magic_function_names.comment: these methods have magic interpretation by python and are generally called indirectly through syntactic constructs
magic_function_names.name: support.function.magic.python

magic_variable_names.comment: magic variables which a class/module may have.
magic_variable_names.name: support.variable.magic.python

regular_expressions.comment: Changed disabled to 1 to turn off syntax highlighting in “r” strings.

patterns.comment: single quoted unicode-raw string without regular expression highlighting
patterns.name: string.quoted.double.block.unicode-raw.python
